verses.verse: וַתָּ֣שַׁר <S%H7891><s%> vat-Ta-shar Then sang דְּבוֹרָ֔ה <S%H1683><s%> de-vo-Rah, Deborah וּבָרָ֖ק <S%H1301><s%> u-va-Rak and Barak בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son אֲבִינֹ֑עַם <S%H42><s%> 'a-vi-No-'am; of Abinoam בַּיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> bai-Yom on that day הַה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> ha-Hu he לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> le-Mor. saying

בִּפְרֹ֤עַ <S%H6544><s%> bif-Ro-a' led פְּרָעוֹת֙ <S%H6546><s%> pe-ra-'Ot the leaders בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> be-Yis-ra-'El, of Israel בְּהִתְנַדֵּ֖ב <S%H5068><s%> be-hit-nad-Dev willingly offered עָ֑ם <S%H5971><s%> 'Am; when the people בָּרֲכ֖וּ <S%H1288><s%> ba-ra-Chu Praise יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. ye the LORD

שִׁמְע֣וּ <S%H8085><s%> shim-'U Hear מְלָכִ֔ים <S%H4428><s%> me-la-Chim, O ye kings הַאֲזִ֖ינוּ <S%H238><s%> ha-'a-Zi-nu give ear רֹֽזְנִ֑ים <S%H7336><s%> ro-ze-Nim; O ye princes אָֽנֹכִ֗י <S%H595><s%> 'a-no-Chi, I לַֽיהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh unto the LORD אָנֹכִ֣י <S%H595><s%> 'a-no-Chi I אָשִׁ֔ירָה <S%H7891><s%> 'a-Shi-rah, I [even] I will sing אֲזַמֵּ֕ר <S%H2167><s%> 'a-zam-Mer I will sing לַֽיהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh [praise] to the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֥י <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei God יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El. of Israel

יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh LORD בְּצֵאתְךָ֤ <S%H3318><s%> be-tze-te-Cha when thou wentest out מִשֵּׂעִיר֙ <S%H8165><s%> mis-se-'Ir of Seir בְּצַעְדְּךָ֙ <S%H6805><s%> be-tza'-de-Cha when thou marchedst out מִשְּׂדֵ֣ה <S%H7704><s%> mis-se-Deh of the field אֱד֔וֹם <S%H123><s%> e-Dom, of Edom אֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> 'E-retz the earth רָעָ֔שָׁה <S%H7493><s%> ra-'A-shah, trembled גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> gam- also שָׁמַ֖יִם <S%H8064><s%> sha-Ma-yim and the heavens נָטָ֑פוּ <S%H5197><s%> na-Ta-fu; dropped גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> gam- Even עָבִ֖ים <S%H5645><s%> 'a-Vim the clouds נָ֥טְפוּ <S%H5197><s%> Na-te-fu also dropped מָֽיִם׃ <S%H4325><s%> Ma-yim. water

הָרִ֥ים <S%H2022><s%> ha-Rim The mountains נָזְל֖וּ <S%H5140><s%> na-ze-Lu melted מִפְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> mip-pe-Nei from before יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; the LORD זֶ֣ה <S%H2088><s%> zeh This סִינַ֔י <S%H5514><s%> si-Nai, [even] that Sinai מִפְּנֵ֕י <S%H6440><s%> mip-pe-Nei from before יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֥י <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei God יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El. of Israel

Israel

לִבִּי֙ <S%H3820><s%> lib-Bi My heart לְחוֹקְקֵ֣י <S%H2710><s%> le-chok-Kei [is] toward the governors יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel הַמִּֽתְנַדְּבִ֖ים <S%H5068><s%> ham-mit-nad-de-Vim that offered themselves willingly בָּעָ֑ם <S%H5971><s%> ba-'Am; among the people בָּרֲכ֖וּ <S%H1288><s%> ba-ra-Chu Bless יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. ye the LORD

רֹכְבֵי֩ <S%H7392><s%> ro-che-Vei ye that ride אֲתֹנ֨וֹת <S%H860><s%> a-to-Not asses צְחֹר֜וֹת <S%H6715><s%> tze-cho-Rot on white יֹשְׁבֵ֧י <S%H3427><s%> yo-she-Vei ye that sit עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on מִדִּ֛ין <S%H4055><s%> mid-Din in judgment וְהֹלְכֵ֥י <S%H1980><s%> ve-ho-le-Chei and walk עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on דֶּ֖רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> De-rech by the way שִֽׂיחוּ׃ <S%H7878><s%> Si-chu. Speak
